conversations.content: I want to work on my heirloom wedding quilt project workspace

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731037000000_h8r9l0o1m", "workspaceId": "ws_1731037000000_h1r2l3o4q", "sessionDescription": "Hand-quilting queen-size wedding quilt with Irish Chain pattern for daughter's wedding", "sessionMemory": "Month 5 of 8-month project. Can you pull up my mushroom foraging and identification workspace?

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731075000000_m5u7s9h1f", "workspaceId": "ws_1731075000000_m1u2s3h4f", "sessionDescription": "Wild mushroom foraging and identification - focus on edible species in local forests with safety-first approach", "sessionMemory": "Season 3 of foraging. Successfully identified and harvested: chanterelles (8 lbs), chicken of the woods (3 lbs), morels (1.5 lbs), oysters (2 lbs). Safety: never eat without 100% ID, spore prints, multiple references. Equipment: field guides, basket, knife, camera. Locations: 5 reliable spots documented with GPS. Took myco-society ID course. Preservation: dried, frozen, pickled. Shared finds with 3 experienced foragers for verification.", "toolContext": "Loading workspace to log yesterday's chanterelle find and plan this weekend's morel hunting spots", "primaryGoal": "Build expertise in safe wild mushroom identification, harvest 30 lbs edibles this season, contribute to local myco-society documentation", "subgoal": "Identify 3 new species confidently, document morel habitats, preserve 15 lbs for winter"}, "id": "ws_1731075000000_m1u2s3h4f"}
